With a talented cast including Simon Pegg and Nick Frost, this movie will have you laughing and cringing in equal measure. On the other hand, if you're looking for a more serious and intense zombie film, then "The Revenant" might be up your alley. Starring Leonardo DiCaprio as a fur trapper mauled by a bear and left for dead, this movie is a gritty and visceral exploration of survival and determination in the face of unimaginable odds.
